content.question: Which of the following best describes the method of vehicle transport that is the most environmentally sustainable?

choices.label: The use of a vehicle powered by hydrogen fuel cells because there are no carbon emissions
The use of a plug-in hybrid vehicle because the fuel sources do not release any carbon dioxide
The use of a vehicle powered by biodiesel because it can be used in conjunction with traditional diesel
The use of a vehicle powered by ethanol because corn is grown to produce energy rather than for human consumption

content.answer: The use of a vehicle powered by hydrogen fuel cells because there are no carbon emissions

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain environmental concepts, processes, or models in applied contexts.
